markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0+"
    pfs=""
>
[Hireling](/Equipment.aspx?ID=67)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 294 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Pathfinder Society characters may not pay for hirelings as listed in the Core Rulebook. More capable hirelings are available via the Achievement Points system._

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Paid laborers can provide services for you. Unskilled hirelings can perform simple manual labor and are untrained at most skills. Skilled hirelings have expert proficiency in a particular skill. Hirelings are level 0. If a skill check is needed, an untrained hireling has a +0 modifier, while a skilled hireling has a +4 modifier in their area of expertise and +0 for other skill checks. Hirelings’ rates double if they’re going adventuring with you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 0"
pfs="Standard"
>
Hireling (Unskilled)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 294 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1 sp (per day)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 0"
pfs="Standard"
>
Hireling (Skilled)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 294 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 5 sp (per day)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>
